column5: Just wondering if anyone has current info on ice around Red Lake/Ear Falls area. Thanks,roger
We have a cabin at Pickerel Lake which is near Minaki, Ontario and the lake iced over completely on Nov. 22nd. heading out this weekend so I'll have more details on how it is building up.
thanks, shout back when you return.

Ice at Pickerel Lake is now 4 inches, enough to walk out on.Most of the lakes along the highway between Winnipeg and Minaki are frozen over.There are still a couple of "deeper" lakes in the area that are still not frozen across, but ice has started on the edges.
cold now will be fine for fishing 'til spring!
was out sunday, 6-9 inches near red lake.

Hey Roger, was up near your lodge last week, just as the cold front moved in. Temps -10 at night ice is good now. Are you planning a trip up to South Bay Lodge this winter to do any Trout fishing? If so give me a shout I'll ride along and keep you company!
Hey Capt O, what have you been doing? Will try to make a trip up to South Bay Lodge in March to do some ice fishing maybe we'll try to hook-up..later, ro
